channel.title: Please help me portforward
channel.description: Ok so before I knew about portforwardiong I just made a server. Then I learned aboutit. After an entire day of trying to do forward it with the portforward.com guides i learned that i need a static i.p. address. I got one and the first time i got it it the last numbers were 136 137 138 138 But now that i did it again just to make sure all the last numbers are 112 NaN what does this mean? I tried forwarding with 112 but it doesnt work!!!! Help meh![br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2007, 05:02:38 PM[/size][hr]Anybody?

item.title: Please help me portforward
item.dc:creator: @Rshacker112 Rshacker112
item.description:
@Rshacker112 wrote:

Nooo don’t go! I still need help!! Lemme just try thi stuff.

EDIT: Ientered the wrong i.p.!!! Got I’m dumbslaps forhead!! Ok now it should work I’m guessing

Double EDIT: Ok I re-entered the i.p. on no-ip and it still won’t work so now im supoposed to try the gateway? I’ll try my other i.p. and then re-try portforwarding. When i portforward am i supposed to use the TCP or UCD or w/e they are?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2007, 06:35:57 PM[/size][hr]Bump this please I need help[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 03:44:39 PM[/size][hr]SOMEBODY HELP ME!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me portforward
item.dc:creator: @no_thx no thx
item.description:
@no_thx wrote:

ok sorry

Step1 - log into no-ip via www.no-ip.com

step2 - once that has loaded then look on the left hand side i think for edit existing server (it does not say server but you know what i mean)

Step3 - at the bottom is should ask for your ip and then try ur static ip first then try default gateway

Step4 - are you sure all ur portfawarding is done correctly?

Step5 - im going bed now im cream crackered talk 2moz if your on

Read full topic

item.title: Please help me portforward

item.description:
@Rshacker112 wrote:

Ok the serverstatus page said it was offline and I know it wasnt since I was on it so it had to be running.I can’t quite understand what your saying. Please use some periods and real words like your instead of ur…
